origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.product_evaluation', 'description': 'This function evaluates an internet finance product based on its type, user ratings, and compliance score.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'productType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of internet finance product, e.g., P2P_Loan, Crowdfunding, Digital_Currency.'}, {'name': 'userRating', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The average user rating of the product.'}, {'name': 'complianceScore', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The score indicating the product’s compliance with financial regulations.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investmentWorthiness', 'description': 'A boolean indicating whether the product is worth investing in.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.product_evaluation, 它的参数输入如下: 'productType'是'P2P_Loan', 'userRating'是'4.5', 'complianceScore'是'82'.
